name: Guerrilla Gorilla Gorillas
description:
Made for The Butterscotch ShenaniJam. 

Guerrilla Gorilla Gorilla theme, the first one we got. 
It's a very simple endless runner.

Don't get hit by bananas and shoot the guerrilla gorillas!  Please don't call PETA.

We ended up calling it early; we were both exhausted. But it was good fun, thanks!
